EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Enterprise Case Study - Swiss Re - 2015.03.25.Email - Follow up - No S
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Swiss Re’s Path to SaaS Quality Assurance with Tosca Testsuite
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent enterprise case study webinar, Swiss Re’s Path to Quality Assurance with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite! In the webinar, Swiss Re’s Ismail Celik, head of Test Automation, shared how Swiss Re managed to address a serious database testing issue and simultaneously increase quality insurance, cut costs, and automate testing. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-enterprise-case-study-swiss-re-watch.html>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Ismail Celik Head of Test Automation Swiss Re
Michael Nosko Service Account Manager Tricentis
